title.description: The license full name specified by https://spdx.org/licenses/

description.description: A human-readable description of the license

how.description: Instructions on how to implement the license

using.description: A list of 3 notable projects using the license with straightforward LICENSE files which serve as examples newcomers can follow and that can be detected by [licensee](https://github.com/licensee/licensee) in the form of `project_name: license_file_url`

featured.description: Whether the license should be featured on the main page (defaults to false)

hidden.description: Whether the license is neither [popular](https://opensource.org/licenses) nor fills out the [spectrum of licenses](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/) from strongly conditional to unconditional (defaults to true)

nickname.description: Customary short name if applicable (e.g, GPLv3)

redirect_from.description: Relative path(s) to redirect to the license from, to prevent breaking old URLs
